text:
MIME type image/x-icon for the shortcut icon is missing, wrong MIME type is 
sent, even if mime_magic was enabled.

Also happen on 1.3.x series.

Fix:

--- mime.types.orig     Fri Jul 19 20:13:46 2002
+++ mime.types  Fri Jul 19 20:14:51 2002
@@ -380,6 +380,7 @@
 image/vnd.wap.wbmp             wbmp
 image/vnd.xiff
 image/x-cmu-raster             ras
+image/x-icon                   ico
 image/x-portable-anymap                pnm
 image/x-portable-bitmap                pbm
 image/x-portable-graymap       pgm
creator: pb@bieringer.de

text:
Hmmm... We have a policy of only adding officially-registered MIME types
to our mime.types file.  This one may be common enough to warrent an
exception.

Other opinions?
creator: slive@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text: *** Bug 12241 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
